  • Method Details

    • approveOfficerRegistration

      public boolean approveOfficerRegistration(int registrationId, String managerNric)
      Description copied from interface: IHDBManagerService
      Approves a pending HDB Officer registration request for a project managed by this manager. Updates registration status, assigns officer to project (via ProjectService), updates officer profile. Checks for available slots.
      Specified by:
      approveOfficerRegistration in interface IHDBManagerService
      Parameters:
      registrationId - ID of the registration request.
      managerNric - NRIC of the manager performing the action (for verification).
      Returns:
      true if approval successful, false otherwise.

    • rejectOfficerRegistration

      public boolean rejectOfficerRegistration(int registrationId, String managerNric)
      Description copied from interface: IHDBManagerService
      Rejects a pending HDB Officer registration request. Updates registration status.
      Specified by:
      rejectOfficerRegistration in interface IHDBManagerService
      Parameters:
      registrationId - ID of the registration request.
      managerNric - NRIC of the manager performing the action (for verification).
      Returns:
      true if rejection successful, false otherwise.

    • approveApplication

      public boolean approveApplication(int applicationId, String managerNric)
      Description copied from interface: IHDBManagerService
      Approves a pending BTO application. Checks flat availability for the applied type. Updates application status to SUCCESSFUL.
      Specified by:
      approveApplication in interface IHDBManagerService
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application.
      managerNric - NRIC of the manager performing the action (for verification).
      Returns:
      true if approval successful, false otherwise (e.g., no units, not manager).

    • rejectApplication

      public boolean rejectApplication(int applicationId, String managerNric)
      Description copied from interface: IHDBManagerService
      Rejects a pending BTO application. Updates application status to UNSUCCESSFUL.
      Specified by:
      rejectApplication in interface IHDBManagerService
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application.
      managerNric - NRIC of the manager performing the action (for verification).
      Returns:
      true if rejection successful, false otherwise.

    • approveWithdrawal

      public boolean approveWithdrawal(int applicationId, String managerNric)
      Description copied from interface: IHDBManagerService
      Approves an applicant's request to withdraw their application. Updates application status (e.g., to WITHDRAWN). Increments available unit count if booked.
      Specified by:
      approveWithdrawal in interface IHDBManagerService
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application with a withdrawal request.
      managerNric - NRIC of the manager performing the action (for verification).
      Returns:
      true if approval successful, false otherwise.

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public boolean rejectWithdrawal(int applicationId, String managerNric)
      Description copied from interface: IHDBManagerService
      Rejects an applicant's request to withdraw their application. Clears the withdrawal request flag.
      Specified by:
      rejectWithdrawal in interface IHDBManagerService
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the application with a withdrawal request.
      managerNric - NRIC of the manager performing the action (for verification).
      Returns:
      true if rejection successful, false otherwise.
